titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that services furnished by a clinical social worker are covered under part B of the medicare program when furnished by a health maintenance organization to a member of that organization.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 6/22/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the supplementary medical insurance program (part B of title XVIII) for services furnished by a clinical social worker to a member of a health maintenance organization.
